moves.1. e4: Hello chessfriends! Want to annotate this game, I won against a 1650 rated player, not so usual that I do this!
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d3: Nothing particular with the opening, yet!
moves.4. Be2 Nf6 5. O-O O-O 6. Nc3 Ng4 7. h3 N: Think the game is even, at this point!
moves.9. Bg5 Be6 10. Nxf6+: ! Now can I destroy the pawn shield in front of Blacks King!
moves.10... gxf6 11. Bh6 Re8: Maybe it was better for Black to sac his Rook and get his King out of danger as soon as possible?
moves.12. c3: Now I must come with my queen to Blacks kingside as soon as possible!
moves.13... Bb6 14. d5: Chasing away Blacks lightsquared bishop makes it easier for me!
moves.14... Bd7 15. Nh4 c6 16. c4 cxd5 17. cxd: A pretty good move. Threatening Qg3+ !
moves.18... Qb6 19. Qg3+: Qg3+. Seems to getting worse and worse for Black!
moves.20... Bxb2 21. Nxg6: Nxg6!! And it´s not possible for Black to save the game. Black gave up!
